segments.text: Whoa, the sink's overflowing like a waterfall!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is totally zoned out on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring onto the floor, she's stepping in it unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And behind her, kids climbing for cookiesâ€”didn't see that coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is tilting, oh man!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a handful, plate in the other hand too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, they're in cahoots.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window makes it all look so bright and unexpected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's right there, open and inviting trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never thought a kitchen could hide so much action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is serene, total contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene caught me off guard completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral face amid the chaos is the biggest shock.
segments.speaker: PAR
